sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		CreationDate as string,
		UserIds as string,
		Operations as string,
		AuditData as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script: section Section1; shared #"CsvBrahmin" = let AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://brahminstorage.blob.core.windows.net/caravan2/AuditLog.csv?sv=2018-03-28&sig=fMe1pJyTdGJT6N4XlmIy25K1CPpV1q8Yd4gLyWh4vK8%3D&spr=https&se=2019-11-05T12%3A08%3A58Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]), PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]), TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName)) in TrimmedHeaders;shared UserQuery = let Source = #"CsvBrahmin" in Source;
